title: Local Hour: I Was Right For What I Was Thinking
description:
David Samson joins us for today's local hour to dive into the upcoming World Series between the Astros and Phillies, Bryce Harper's value, the legacy of Dave Dombrowski, the business of Kanye West and Adidas, and Michael Kay's height before his review of "Reboot." Then, Dan reads insults of Pat Riley from the internet, and we discuss the price of a dinner with Scottie Pippen.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
